long_description: THe REI Stuff Travel daypack is a versatile performer for all your journeys-from local adventures to exotic locales; this bag is easy to pack and hard to leave behind. Durable lightweight ripstop nylon compacts easily for packing or storage but is hardy enough for the rigors of travel. Rucksack style pack with top pocket and drawcord access to main body. Pack folds up in to its own zippered stuff pocket for easy transport or storage. REI Stuff Travel daypack has side mesh pockets with elastic closures that hold water bottles and allow easy access to small essentials.
short_description: THe REI Stuff Travel daypack is a versatile performer for all your journeys-from local adventures to exotic locales; this bag is easy to pack and hard to leave behind.
